Enumerations
CR_TILE_DRAW_MODE

Numbers to represent which stage drawing mode to use.

CR_TILE_DRAW_CHUNKS

- The map is stored in chunks: Draw only the chunks visible on screen.

CR_TILE_DRAW_ONECHUNK

- The map is stored as one big chunk: Only the tiles visible on-screen are drawn in this mode.

CR_TILE_DRAW_BIGCHUNKS

- The map is stored in chunks bigger than the screen size: Only the tiles visible on-screen are drawn in this mode.

Data Structures
CR_TILE_MAP

Crimson Tile Map.

Members
sheet_width

Width of tile sheet in blocks.

sheet_height

Height of tile sheet in blocks.

tile_width

Width of the tile in pixels.

tile_height

Height of the tile in pixels.

Stage Drawing Functions
cr_stage_draw
void cr_stage_draw(
CR_TEXTURE *tileset,
CR_TILE_MAP *map,
unsigned char draw_layer
)

Draw a stage based on a Crimsn Tilemap structure.

Parameters
tileset
CR_TEXTURE*

Tileset texture to draw with.

map
CR_TILE_MAP*

Crimson Tilemap structure to use.

draw_layer
unsigned char

Layer to draw on.

See Also

cr_stage_chunk_draw

cr_stage_chunk_draw
void cr_stage_chunk_draw(
CR_TEXTURE *tileset,
CR_TILE_MAP *map,
signed long layout_x,
signed long layout_y,
unsigned char draw_layer
)

Draw a chunk from within a Crimson Tilemap structure. This is primarily used within cr_stage_draw, but can be used on its own if you know what Chunk ID's to use.

Parameters
tileset
CR_TEXTURE*

Tileset texture to draw with.

map
CR_TILE_MAP*

Crimson Tilemap structure to use.

layout_x
signed long

Chunk ID on the X axis.

layout_y
signed long

Chunk ID on the Y axis.

See Also

cr_stage_draw
